people.description: A human user interacting with SolMobile on a personal device.
people.name: End User

components.description: Implements POST /v1/chat; validates Packet/Transmission and budgets.
components.name: Chat Endpoint

components.description: Applies routing/budgets/drift controls; gates calls and shapes context.
components.name: Policy Engine

components.description: Selects memory summaries for injection (domain-scoped, capped).
components.name: Retrieval Service

components.description: Calls external LLM provider as stateless inference.
components.name: Inference Client

softwareSystems.description: Backend policy/runtime: routing, budgets, drift controls, and explicit memory APIs.
softwareSystems.name: SolServer

components.description: Creates/lists Threads; pinning/TTL metadata; last-active tracking.
components.name: Thread Store

components.description: Stores Messages for a Thread; append/read/query.
components.name: Message Store

components.description: Processes Captures (transcribe/extract/fetch) and updates Capture records.
components.name: Capture Processor

components.description: Offline-first Transmission store queue; retry via DeliveryAttempts.
components.name: Transmission Store

softwareSystems.description: Native iOS client for a personal AI operating interface with explicit memory and drift control.
softwareSystems.name: SolMobile

softwareSystems.description: External managed LLM service used as a stateless reasoning engine.
softwareSystems.name: Inference Provider

softwareSystems.description: Error tracking and optional tracing for client and server.
softwareSystems.name: Observability

dynamicViews.description: Client creates a Message, enqueues a Transmission+Packet, sends /v1/chat, server applies control plane (mode+gates), may read/write explicit memory, calls inference, and returns an assistant message.
dynamicViews.name: Dynamic View: SolMobile - iOS App
dynamicViews.title: Chat turn: Packet → ModeDecision → Prompt → Inference

dynamicViews.description: Transmission Store retries sending a Transmission; each send attempt is recorded as a DeliveryAttempt (modeled as internal state). requestId provides idempotency server-side.
dynamicViews.name: Dynamic View: SolMobile - iOS App
dynamicViews.title: Transmission retry: DeliveryAttempts

dynamicViews.description: When deterministic routing is low-confidence, SolServer performs an extra inference pass to select ModeDecision before generating the final assistant response. (Two inference calls shown in order.)
dynamicViews.name: Dynamic View: SolMobile - iOS App
dynamicViews.title: Selector escalation: ambiguous routing
